origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_sustainability_report', 'description': 'This function provides a sustainability analysis report based on the report type and coverage area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of sustainability report, e.g., industry, company-specific.'}, {'name': 'coverageArea', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical area the report covers, e.g., global, regional.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The sustainability analysis report.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_sustainability_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'industry', 'coverageArea'是'global'.
